eventSummary: Users are being asked to block and report a scammer.Sources:- https://t.me/nexofinance

Yearn Finance suffered an exploit in its yETH stable swap pool on November 30, 2025, at 21:11 UTC. The attacker exploited a vulnerability to mint approximately 235 trillion yETH tokens, leading to the draining of liquidity pools on Balancer and total losses of around $9 million. Of this, $3 million (1000 ETH) was sent to Tornado Cash, with the remaining $6 million held by the attacker. A detailed report on the exploit is available.Sources:- https://cryptopotato.com/yearn-finance-loses-9m-in-single-transaction-exploit-of-yeth-vault- https://cryptopanic.com/news/27546387/Exploit-on-Yearn-Finance-28-million-yETH-attack- https://github.com/banteg/yeth-exploit/blob/main/report.pdf
